pmath::Gather

pmath::Gather Class Reference
[C++ Binding]

Utility class for emitting and gathering expressions/building lists

Gathering begins with the construction of the object and ends with a call to end() or the object destruction. More...

Static Public Member Functions

static void emit (Expr e)
 emit a value to be gathered.

Detailed Description

Utility class for emitting and gathering expressions/building lists

Gathering begins with the construction of the object and ends with a call to end() or the object destruction.

Note:
Gathering multiple lists at once is not supported!
